mapper.select: SELECT C.CONVENIENCE_IDX, C.NAME FROM CONVENIENCE_TB C JOIN PACKAGE_CONVENIENCE_TB CB ON C.CONVENIENCE_IDX = CB.CONVENIENCE_IDX WHERE CB.PACKAGE_IDX = #{param1}

SELECT P.PACKAGE_IDX, P.USER_IDX, P.TITLE, P.START_DATE, P.END_DATE, P.LIMITED_PERSON, P.PRICE, P.DETAIL1, P.DETAIL2, P.DETAIL3, P.ZIP_CODE, P.ADDRESS1, P.ADDRESS2, P.PTYPE_IDX, P.HIT, P.CATEGORY, (P.END_DATE - P.START_DATE) || '일간' AS DURATION FROM PACKAGE_TB P WHERE PACKAGE_IDX = #{param1}

SELECT R.PACKAGE_REVIEW_IDX, R.PACKAGE_IDX, R.CONTENT, R.PERSON_IDX, R.CREATED, P.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || P.LAST_NAME AS FULL_NAME, ra.rate from package_tb pa join package_review_tb r on pa.package_idx = r.package_idx join person_tb p on r.person_idx = p.person_idx join package_rate_tb ra on r.package_review_idx = ra.package_review_idx where pa.package_idx = #{param1}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM package_tb pa JOIN package_review_tb r ON pa.package_idx = r.package_idx JOIN person_tb p ON r.person_idx = p.person_idx JOIN package_rate_tb ra ON r.package_review_idx = ra.package_review_idx WHERE pa.package_idx = #{param1}

SELECT AVG(ra.rate) AS rate FROM package_tb pa JOIN package_review_tb r ON pa.package_idx = r.package_idx JOIN person_tb p ON r.person_idx = p.person_idx JOIN package_rate_tb ra ON r.package_review_idx = ra.package_review_idx WHERE pa.package_idx = #{param1}

SELECT MAX(ra.rate) AS rate FROM package_tb pa JOIN package_review_tb r ON pa.package_idx = r.package_idx JOIN person_tb p ON r.person_idx = p.person_idx JOIN package_rate_tb ra ON r.package_review_idx = ra.package_review_idx WHERE pa.package_idx = #{param1}
SELECT PACKAGE_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE FROM ( SELECT PACKAGE_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE, ROWNUM AS RN FROM PACKAGE_IMAGE WHERE PACKAGE_IDX = #{param1} ) WHERE RN = 1
SELECT PACKAGE_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE FROM ( SELECT PACKAGE_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE, ROWNUM AS RN FROM PACKAGE_IMAGE WHERE PACKAGE_IDX =#{param1} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT PACKAGE_IMAGE_IDX, IMAGE FROM PACKAGE_IMAGE WHERE PACKAGE_IDX =#{param1}
